00019 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry : public FCDEntity
00020 {
00021 private:
00022     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntity);
00023 
00024 public:
00025     enum GeomType { BOX, PLANE, SPHERE, CYLINDER, CAPSULE, TAPERED_CYLINDER, TAPERED_CAPSULE };
00026 
00027     FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry(FCDocument* document);
00028     virtual ~FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry();
00029 
00030     virtual Type GetType() const {return PHYSICS_ANALYTICAL_GEOMETRY;}
00031 
00032     // Returns the entity type
00033     virtual GeomType GetGeomType() const = 0;
00034 
00035     // Copies this analyticalGeometry into the given clone object
00036     virtual FCDEntity* Clone(FCDEntity* clone = NULL, bool cloneChildren = false) const;
00037 
00038     // Read in the <physics_analyticalGeometry> node of the COLLADA document
00039     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node);
00040 
00041     // Write out the <physics_analyticalGeometry> node to the COLLADA XML tree
00042     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const = 0;
00043 };
